definition: variant of 稱|称[cheng1], to weigh
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
the beam of a steelyard/a balance arm
the tray or pan of a steelyard
balance consisting of steelyard with a pan/CL:臺|台[tai2]
although small, a steelyard weight may tip a hundred pounds (idiom)/apparently insignificant details can have a large impact/for want of a nail the battle was lost
pinyin: cheng4 tuo2 sui1 xiao3 ya1 qian1 jin1

sentences.english: But Love does not traffic in a marketplace, nor use a huckster's scales.
sentences.chinese: 但爱不在市场上交易，也不用小贩的秤来称量。

sentences.english: Quick packing speed, capable of working with single or double scale hoppers.
sentences.chinese: 包装速度快，可单秤或双秤工作。

sentences.english: Quick packing speed, capable of working with single or double scale hoppers.
sentences.chinese: 包装速度快，可单秤或双秤工作。

sentences.english: Weigh these pears on the balance.
sentences.chinese: 在秤上称一称梨的重量。

sentences.english: The Digital Luggage Scale allows you to pack smarter and avoid paying overweight luggage fees.
sentences.chinese: 数字行李秤让你更聪明的包装，避免支付超重行李费。

sentences.english: The relation between the electronic counting scale repetitiveness and sample discreteness.
sentences.chinese: 电子计数秤的重复性及样品离散性之间的关系。

sentences.english: Please put your luggage on the scale.
From now on, you may be required to step onto the luggage scale.
sentences.chinese: 现在开始你得把行李拉去秤上过过秤。

sentences.english: Put your baggage on the scale, please.
sentences.chinese: 请将你的行李放在秤上过磅。

sentences.english: Counter next to set up platform balance, in addition to outside baggage should weigh on.
sentences.chinese: 柜台旁边设置有台秤，除了手提行李以外，都要上秤。

sentences.english: Will you please put the suitcase on the scales? You need't weigh your handbag.
sentences.chinese: 请把箱子放在秤上好吗？手提包不必过秤了。

sentences.english: Weigh yourself first thing in the morning before you eat or drink anything.
sentences.chinese: 在吃或者喝任何东西之前，早晨第一件事就是秤体重。

sentences.english: Put your bags on the scale.
sentences.chinese: 请把您的旅游包放在秤上。

sentences.english: There is a huge steelyard here.
A scientist without imagination is a butcher with dull knives and out-worn scales.
sentences.chinese: 一个没有想像力的科学家，一如屠夫手握钝刀和旧秤。

definition: Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
Taurus (star sign)/Jinniu district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
steelyard weight/stone roller/to polish jade with an emery wheel
the tray or pan of a steelyard
balance consisting of steelyard with a pan/CL:臺|台[tai2]
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
